content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 15, 2021 13 Types of Social Engineering Attacks December 15, 2021 What Are Social Engineering Attacks? Social engineering attacks are the manipulation of individuals to the point where they give out confidential information. The type of information these attackers may seek varies, but when individuals or employees are targeted, they are usually looking for passwords or banking information.
